input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Associate

Location: Rochester, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Hiring immediately!

At Wegmans, it takes the work of numerous individuals to make possible the incredible customer service we provide every day. As a worker in one of our Warehouse Facilities, you will work hands-on with products, accurately selecting cases to ensure our 100+ store locations receive the items they ordered and are able to meet their customers’ needs. If you love working in a fast-paced, physically demanding job where you contribute to the success of the company’s bottom line, then this is the job for you!

Why join the Wegmans team?

Work for a family-owned company that has been on Fortune magazine’s list of the 100 Best Companies to Work For list for 24 years in a rowOpportunities for career growth, both within the distribution facilities and companywide Competitive pay with annual scheduled increases – full time earning potential up to $28.95 with 4 years on the jobComprehensive benefits including healthcare (available to both full and part time eligible employees)$.45/hour pay differentials for select positions

What Will I do?

Accurately pick, scan, stack and place selected cases on a pallet and arrange orderly to minimize product damage for safe delivery to storesSafely operate equipment necessary to perform job duties; this may include a forklift, pallet jack, and/or VocollectFollow voice commands and/or read order to ascertain correct case number and quantity of merchandise is selectedStand and do repetitive work for long periods of timeMay work in and have exposure to various temperatures (Warehouse temperatures range from -20 degrees F in Frozen, to 85 Degrees F in the grocery warehouse)

Required Qualifications

Ability to work and prioritize order accuracy in a fast-paced and physically demanding work environmentAbility to lift greater than 50 lbs occasionally to frequently – with or without reasonable accommodationExperience working in a warehouse, manufacturing and/or distribution facility, or other relatable physically demanding work experience

Preferred Qualifications

Experience operating a pallet jack, forklift, and VoCollectExperience working in a Food Distribution Center

Full time

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Warehouse Associate
output_json.summary: Hands-on Warehouse Associate position at Wegmans.
job_responsibilities: Accurately pick, scan, stack, and place selected cases on a pallet
Arrange orderly to minimize product damage for safe delivery to stores
Safely operate equipment such as forklifts, pallet jacks
Follow voice commands or read orders to ascertain correct case numbers and quantities
Stand and do repetitive work for long periods of time
Work in and have exposure to various temperatures
output_json.physical_requirements: Ability to lift greater than 50 lbs occasionally to frequently
benefits: Competitive pay with annual scheduled increases
